articles.description: Bruce Springsteen and Patti Scialfa are first-time grandparents after son Sam welcomed baby Lily Harper Springsteen. Scialfa posted the news Friday.
articles.content:
Bruce Springsteen is a grandfather!
Patti Scialfa, Springsteen's wife and bandmate, showed off Lily Harper Springsteen, the daughter of their youngest son, Sam, on Instagram Friday.
“Walking the ba… [+2012 chars]

articles.title: John Cena and wife Shay Shariatzadeh say 'I do' for a second time as they host a Vancouver wedding - Daily Mail
articles.description: John Cena and his wife Shay Shariatzadeh got married a second time in Vancouver on Friday.
articles.content:
John Cena and his wife Shay Shariatzadeh got married a second time in Vancouver on Friday.
